ruling: - The effect of this card is a Trigger Effect that can be chained to.

- This effect only activates if the card is discarded by a card effect. It will not activate if discarded for the cost of a card like [[Lightning Vortex]], [[Raigeki Break]], [[Tribe-Infecting Virus]], or [[Infernal Incinerator]]. It will not activate if sent to the graveyard by a card effect like [[Last Turn]] or [[Chaos Emperor Dragon - Envoy of the End]].
- The effect of this card activates in the Graveyard, so [[Skill Drain]] will not negate this effects.
- This effect can activate in the Damage Step, if discarded by the effect of a card like [[Don Zaloog]].

- If this card is discarded by a card effect in the middle of a chain, or in the middle of a card effect like [[Dragged Down into the Grave]], its effect will activate after the current chain resolves. It cannot miss the timing.
- If this card is discarded from your hand by a card effect while [[Macro Cosmos]] is on the field, its effect will not activate because it was not discarded to the Graveyard.
